snippet.title: Mr. Sun's Hatbox - Official Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Learn more about the story and objectives of Mr. Sun’s Hatbox, like base expansion and much more, from this upcoming slapstick, roguelite platformer game about getting the job done, no matter the cost. 

In Mr. Sun's Hatbox, upgrade your HQ, your team, and your tools so you can take on increasingly dangerous (and ridiculous) missions in pursuit of not only the hat you’ve lost, but as many hats as you can handle.

Mr. Sun’s Hatbox will be available on PC in 2023, and a demo for the game is available now on Steam.
